scripts.test: pnpm run test:integration && pnpm run test:unit
scripts.deploy:dev: pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy --branch dev
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy --branch main
scripts.cf-typegen: wrangler types --env preview  && move worker-configuration.d.ts src/
scripts.migrations:run:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply ez-share-dev --env preview
scripts.migrations:run:dev: wrangler d1 migrations apply ez-share-dev --remote --env preview
scripts.migrations:run:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply ez-share-prod --remote --env production
